com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurSensors

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurSensors

  • public class NurSensors
extends java.lang.Object
    Module sensor configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int GPIO_ACT_INVENTORY
      Start inventory on GPIO change.
      static int GPIO_ACT_NONE
      No action.

      Send NUR_NOTIFICATION_IOCHANGE notification on GPIO change.

      Start single tag scan on GPIO change.

      Sensor event source is tap.

    • Field Detail

      • GPIO_ACT_NONE

        public static final int GPIO_ACT_NONE
        No action. GPIO state can be read manually.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GPIO_ACT_NOTIFY

        public static final int GPIO_ACT_NOTIFY
        Send NUR_NOTIFICATION_IOCHANGE notification on GPIO change.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GPIO_ACT_SCANTAG

        public static final int GPIO_ACT_SCANTAG
        Start single tag scan on GPIO change. Tag result is received with NUR_NOTIFICATION_TRIGGERREAD notification.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GPIO_ACT_INVENTORY

        public static final int GPIO_ACT_INVENTORY
        Start inventory on GPIO change. Result is received with NUR_NOTIFICATION_INVENTORYSTREAM notification.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SENSOR_SRC_TAP

        public static final int SENSOR_SRC_TAP
        Sensor event source is tap.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SENSOR_SRC_LIGHT

        public static final int SENSOR_SRC_LIGHT
        Sensor event source is light.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
